A series involving the characters of the Xenoblade game series. Blades are weapons that take on the shapes of people, usually humans, and are wielded by people known as drivers. The main character Rex one day decides to take on a mission on his own without the help of his blade. During the mission he meets a mysterious individual who has abilities beyond what he could've imagined, beginning his new path from being a driver to becoming a blade...

Gain access to my other TSF works by supporting me and receive other perks like deciding on what future content will be released.
